Text: Thanks SO much to the one seeder who's keeping this at a decent speed. I loved this series.  I've got another hour to go, so please keep it up.

When I finally get it all, I'll keep it seeded for at least a month -- especially now that Netflix is taking it off their instant viewing in a week.
Hope that'll help the other folks who want it; I run pretty close to 24/7, so people should easily be able to grab it if they want it.
